Variant Name: Verona - 46 inch Designer Range Hood Insert with 1200 CFM, Stainless Steel Baffle Filters, LED Lighting in Stainless Steel (Designer / Hood / Stainless Steel) - VEINS46GSS
Variant HTML:
Installing into your cabinets, the 46-inch Designer Range Hood Insert by Verona VEINS46GSS features a powerful 4-speed, 1200 CFM ventilation fan that will whisk away smoke and grease from your kitchen. The hood's stainless steel baffle filters are safe to wash in the dishwasher.

Range Hood Insert from the Designer Series, 46"

Stainless steel baffle filters, four LED lights, a time delay shut-off, and four fan speeds are all part of the 46" Designer Series hood insert by Verona.


Tuscan hood cover

Get that commercial-grade performance with a sleek, straight-line look by installing the Verona insert into a hood surround without a hitch.


5-Button Illuminated Keyboard

A five-button illuminated keypad made of stainless steel makes it easy to control the fan speed, LED work lights, and automatic shut-off timer.


Here are some extra features:

  • Safe for use in the dishwasher baffle filters made of stainless steel with an anti-grease coating.
  • With its 1200 CFM motor, you can effectively remove smoke, grease, and unpleasant smells from your kitchen.
  • A maintenance light for the grease filter.


Freight Charges May Apply

Features

  • Maintenance Light for Grease Filters
    • It is crucial to clean the metal grease filter on a regular basis to prevent bad odors caused by grease buildup and to keep the cooker hood components protected. The hood will automatically notify you when the filter needs to be cleaned.
  • Stainless Steel Baffle Screens
    • The baffle vent filters made of stainless steel by Capital are easy to clean and remove.
  • Postponed Turnoff of Power
    • Turns off the hood automatically after a predetermined amount of time to eliminate any remaining smells.
  • Signal for Changing the Charcoal Filter
    • A built-in indicator will let you know when the charcoal filters need to be replaced so you can stay informed about the air filtration.
  • 1.2 m3/s
    • Offers strong airflow to efficiently extinguish cooking odors, grease, and smoke.
